name: Ashes of Equestria
description: Ashes of Equestria is a fan-made RPG based on Kkat's novel Fallout: Equestria. We're currently in the early stages of development, and we'll be uploading demo and release versions here as they arrive. Follow our progress with bi-weekly blog posts, join the discussion on our community forum, or apply to join the team at theovermare.com!
